Regulation Name(s): Device To Detect And Identify Nucleic Acid Targets In Respiratory Specimens From Microbial Agents That Cause The SARS-CoV-2 Respiratory Infection And Other Microbial Agents When In A Multi-Target Test
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Abbott Alinity m Resp-4-Plex multiplex RT-PCR assay for detection and differentiation of SARS-CoV-2, influenza A, influenza B, and RSV using the Alinity m System.
Indications for Use Summary: Multiplex qualitative RT-PCR assay for use with the Alinity m System to detect and differentiate SARS-CoV-2, influenza A, influenza B, and RSV RNA in nasopharyngeal swab specimens from patients with respiratory infection signs and symptoms.
